original_text: But the high priest rose up, and all who were with him (that is, the party of the Sadducees), and filled with jealousy
korean_text: 대제사장과 그와 함께 있는 사람 즉 사두개인의 당파가 다 마음에 시기가 가득하여 일어나서

sentences.original_text: But the high priest rose up
and all who were with him
that is, the party of the Sadducees
